segments.text: For the 100th anniversary of the opening of the library we are going to have a party .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a wonderful way to celebrate this grand old library !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hoped you would be willing to brainstorm with me for party ideas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is right up my alley . You say party and I'm there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perfect . It will be open to the public and we anticipate roughly about five to seven hundred people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will it be an all day event ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . And we checked with the city and we have permission to use the park adjacent to the library .
segments.speaker: S1
